original_text: If what they vowed is a ceremonially unclean animal—one that is not acceptable as an offering to the Lord—the animal must be presented to the priest,
korean_text: 부정하여 여호와께 예물로 드리지 못할 가축이면 그 가축을 제사장 앞으로 끌어갈 것이요

sentences.original_text: If what they vowed is a ceremonially unclean animal
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 서약한 것이 의식적으로 부정한 동물이라면

sentences.original_text: one that is not acceptable as an offering to the Lord
the animal must be presented to the priest
